Therefore, paramount that GenAI models comply or reg-ulatory regimes. .Conclusion: The primary objective of this study was to investigate a keyshortcoming of generalist GenAI in medical uses, that is,the off-label promotion of medical products, and highlightthe importance by model developers to adhere to existingregulations. In addition to this, we demonstrated a proof-of-principlemethod for detection of off-label medical product pro-motion in MLLM responses. Using our algorithm, we iden-tified instances of off-label promotion for a selection of 35pharmaceuticals.
